name: To Ward It Off And Drown It Out - Sohns - Debut Full-Length Album
description:
We're finally releasing our debut full-length! This record is entitled "To Ward It Off And Drown It Out" and is 9 tracks of loud, loud, heavy, loud.

The recorded the album in Seattle, WA at Red Room under the watchful eye of Producer/Engineer/Mixer Chris Common (These Arms Are Snakes, Pelican, Native), and mastered at West West Side Music by the ever-amazing Alan Douches. 

The manufacturing of this album was a labor of love, we had many of our friends involved in the process and kept it all as local as possible.

Design and Layout - Joe Raymond Vega
Screenprinting - Underbelly

The tracklist is as follows:
1. Let's Start A Cult
2. We'll Call It A Safehouse
3. Pieces and Pieces and Pieces...
4. Battlorches
5. New Reasons
6. Old Reasons
7. A Place Called Worship
8. Holy Mouth
9. In Six Years...
